sense.name: turn on an axis; spin
sense.examples: The shims rotated the entire housing, including the steering components. If your pelvis rotates anteriorly, it can cause you a lot of pain. The ballerina can rotate her leg out by 90 degrees. The monkey rotated the joystick in reaction to the stimulus.

sense.name: exchange or switch (out) regularly
sense.examples: Farmers must rotate their crops every few years to renew the soil. The lead singer is rotated every week so that no one gets over-worked. At this job I rotate from marketing to research to programming. I rotate different brands of cat food because my cats get bored easily.
